snippet: Three bombs targeted public markets and a Shiite mosque, the police said, the latest in a run of Sunni radical mayhem.
abstract: Three bombs that targeted public markets and a fourth bomb placed outside a Shiite mosque explode in Baghdad, killing 25 people and wounding dozens.
lead_paragraph: Three bombs targeted public markets and a Shiite mosque, the police said, the latest in a run of Sunni radical mayhem.

headline.main: Quadruple Bombing in Baghdad Kills at Least 25
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Deadly Bombings Strike Baghdad Neighborhoods
